AboutPage.storyHeading: A place where every dish tells a story
AboutPage.storyText1: ONA was born from a deep love for Bulgarian culinary traditions and a desire to share them with the world. Nestled in the heart of Skatevtsi, our restaurant is a celebration of heritage, flavor, and artistry.
AboutPage.storyText2: Every ingredient we use is carefully sourced from local farms and producers, ensuring that each plate reflects the authenticity and richness of our land.
AboutPage.philosophyHeading: Rooted in tradition, refined by passion
AboutPage.philosophyText: We believe that great food begins with great respect — for the ingredients, the process, and the people who gather around the table. Our kitchen is guided by seasonality, simplicity, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.
AboutPage.value1Text: Every ingredient tells a story of the land it comes from. We partner with local farmers and artisans.
AboutPage.value2Text: Each dish is a work of art, meticulously prepared with techniques passed down through generations.
AboutPage.value3Text: We create an atmosphere where every guest feels like family, welcomed with warmth and care.
AboutPage.teamText: Our team brings together years of culinary expertise, a shared passion for Bulgarian cuisine, and an unwavering commitment to creating unforgettable dining experiences.

articles.title: Farm-to-Table Partnership
articles.excerpt: We are proud to announce our new partnership with local organic farms in the Rhodope mountains.

articles.title: Holiday Special Menu
articles.excerpt: Celebrate the festive season with our specially crafted holiday menu featuring traditional Bulgarian delicacies.

articles.title: Culinary Workshop
articles.excerpt: Learn the secrets of Bulgarian cuisine in our hands-on workshop led by our award-winning chef.
